import React,{useState}from"react";import{useNavigate}from"react-router-dom";import img1 from"../assets/images/img1.png";import img2 from"../assets/images/img2.png";import img3 from"../assets/images/img3.png";import"../assets/css/productListStyles.css";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ProductList=()=>{const navigate=useNavigate();// Initial product data including pictures
const[products,setProducts]=useState([{id:1,name:"Rose Bouquet",price:"$25",image:img1},{id:2,name:"Tulip Arrangement",price:"$30",image:img2},{id:3,name:"Lily Basket",price:"$20",image:img3}]);const addProduct=newProduct=>{console.log("Adding new product:",newProduct);setProducts([...products,newProduct]);};const updateProduct=updatedProduct=>{console.log("Updating product:",updatedProduct);setProducts(products.map(product=>product.id===updatedProduct.id?updatedProduct:product));};const goToAddProduct=()=>{console.log("Navigating to Add Product...");navigate("/products/add",{state:{addProduct}});};const goToEditProduct=product=>{console.log("Navigating to Edit Product:",product);navigate("/products/edit",{state:{product,updateProduct}});};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"product-list",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Product Management"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:goToAddProduct,className:"btn",children:"Add New Product"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"products",children:products.map(product=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"product-item",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:product.image,alt:product.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:product.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:product.price}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>goToEditProduct(product),children:"Edit"})]},product.id))})]});};export default ProductList;
